Thank you for your interest in contacting us.

The most reasons to contact us are:

- Invite a AI specialist to be a speaker in a conference or event
- Invite a AI specialist to moderate our participate in a panel
- Ask for help reviewing a book, article or paper
- Ask for help with an open source project
- Give general feedback on this website or [our open source projects](https://github.com/MeyerPerin-Foundation)

Please let us know what you need in the "message" field, and we will get back to you.
